about_the_game:
Enter the shadowy world of Nosferatu's Dominion, a groundbreaking hybrid Action RPG and RTS Lite where strategy, city-building, and immersive role-playing converge. As Nosferatu, the ancient vampire lord, your dark legacy begins with a single village—and your ambition knows no bounds.

Key Features:

  • Action RPG combined with City-Building and Strategy: Hypnotize and convert villagers to construct and expand a gothic village. Build infrastructure, manage resources, and design a thriving hub of darkness tailored to your needs.

  • Complex Ecosystems and Genetics: Interact with a dynamic environment that evolves with your actions. Shape the genetic traits of your villagers to enhance their abilities. Nosferatu's abilities are impacted by consuming unique blood of his villagers and animals.

  • Feed and Manage: Balance your need to feed on villagers with their productivity and survival. Build a delicate ecosystem where your hunger fuels your power, but overindulgence could spell disaster.

  • Genetics with Inherited Traits. Nosferatu hypnotizes and enthralls humans to join his growing village. Each villager, and animal, has unique genetics which contribute to their traits and blood characteristics. These are passed on to their offspring based on actual biological science, and they impact Nosferatu in dynamic ways when he consumes their blood.

  • Dynamic ecosystems.  From inherited genetic traits to wildlife and vegetation that respond to the player's actions, every choice you make impacts the world around you, offering a deep and engaging strategic experience.

  • Quest and Evolve: Embark on quests to unlock powerful abilities and grow stronger. Rich character development and storylines contribute to numerous consequential choices which shape Nosferatu's experience and the surrounding ecosystem and NPCs.  Shape Nosferatu’s path to become an unstoppable vampire lord.

  • Defend and Conquer: Protect your village from rival forces while expanding your dominion.

Will you create a sustainable empire of darkness or see your dominion collapse under the weight of rebellion and ruin? In Nosferatu's Dominion, every decision matters in your quest to rule the night.

  • Feed and Manage: Balance your need to feed on villagers with their productivity and survival. Build a delicate ecosystem where your hunger fuels your power, but overindulgence could spell disaster.

Each villager, and animal, has unique genetics which contribute to their traits and blood characteristics. These are passed on to their offspring based on actual biological science, and they impact Nosferatu in dynamic ways when he consumes their blood.

Rich character development and storylines contribute to numerous consequential choices which shape Nosferatu's experience and the surrounding ecosystem and NPCs.  Shape Nosferatu’s path to become an unstoppable vampire lord.

Will you create a sustainable empire of darkness or see your dominion collapse under the weight of rebellion and ruin? In Nosferatu's Dominion, every decision matters in your quest to rule the night.
name: Nosferatu's Dominion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600, 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti (Maxwell or newer), 2 GB or AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements might change in the future
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K, 3.9 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X, 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 590, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended System Requirements might change in the future

short_description: Build and rule your gothic dominion as the vampire Nosferatu in this hybrid Action-RPG/RTS game where choices matter. Hypnotize and feed upon your villagers, who have unique inherited traits, to thrive and unlock vampiric abilities.
